name: careflow-mcp
description: CareFlow MCP - Production-ready healthcare workflow automation with HIPAA-compliant patient task management powered by n8n

tools.name: trigger_workflow
tools.description: Triggers an n8n webhook workflow by name and passes a JSON payload. Returns execution ID or response data.

workflowName.description: Name of the n8n workflow to trigger

payload.description: JSON payload to send to the workflow webhook

tools.name: list_workflows
tools.description: Lists all active workflows from n8n REST API. Returns workflow IDs, names, and metadata.

tools.name: get_workflow_status
tools.description: Checks execution status of a workflow run by execution ID. Returns status, timestamps, and result data.

executionId.description: The execution ID returned from trigger_workflow

tools.name: create_patient_task
tools.description: Sends a structured patient task payload to a specified n8n workflow. Designed for healthcare workflows with HIPAA compliance.

workflowName.description: Name of the n8n workflow to receive the task

taskType.description: Type of task (e.g., appointment, medication, followup)

assignedTo.description: User or team assigned to the task

N8N_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of your n8n instance (e.g., https://n8n.example.com)

N8N_API_KEY.description: n8n API Key (generate in n8n Settings > API)

N8N_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Optional webhook secret for authenticated endpoints

installation.source: git clone https://github.com/pratapsfdc22-dev/careflow-mcp.git && cd careflow-mcp && npm install && npm run build

examples.name: Healthcare Patient Management
examples.description: HIPAA-compliant patient task management with EHR integration

examples.name: E-commerce Order Processing
examples.description: Automated order processing with inventory, payment, and shipping
